name: 3dSliceNDice
author: AFNI Developers
description: Calculates the Dice coefficient between two volumes on a slice-by-slice basis.

inputs.description: Specify which slices to include in the Dice coefficient report. Options are: all (default), AorB, AandB, Amask, Bmask.
inputs.name: Output domain flag

inputs.description: Turn OFF recording the command line call in the output *.1D files. Default is to do the recording.
inputs.name: No command echo flag

output-files.description: Output file containing Dice coefficients along the right-left axis.
output-files.name: Output RL file

output-files.description: Output file containing Dice coefficients along the anterior-posterior axis.
output-files.name: Output AP file

output-files.description: Output file containing Dice coefficients along the inferior-superior axis.
output-files.name: Output IS file
